document_data.name: Black Avatar
document_data.mainbody: The '''Black Avatar''' was a tavern with a sinister reputation found in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]] before that city's destruction.
document_data.Location: The Black Avatar was located in Zhentil Keep's [[Zhentil Keep/Inner Quarter|Inner Quarter]] in the north section of the quarter in between [[Raven Street]] and the [[Street of the Gods]].
document_data.Activities: Disciples of [[Bane]] used the Black Avatar as a place of relaxation. It was rumored that many wicked deals were struck within the Black Avatar.
